channel.title: Stuck pixel
channel.description:
So for Christmas, my parents gave me an iPod Touch, and it was all cool, until a couple of hours after, when I noticed that there was a stuck pixel, permanently white.
I then searched if there was anything I could do about it, and it seems that apps that can flash all colours really fast sometimes fixes the problem, so I was wondering if anybody knew any apps in the app store that can do just that?
Thanks.

item.title: Stuck pixel
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
Nah, I ain’t that dumb

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck pixel

item.description:
As long as you don’t do something retarded an open it up. That will void the warranty.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck pixel
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
I don’t know why I didn’t think of that :retard:

But thanks, I’ll try it out.

And I just figured that I might as well try and see if I can fix it myself before deciding to return it.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck pixel
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
app store? dude just download a video and do it, or youtube one, there are tons.

But if it’s new, why not return it for a new unit

EDIT: use this;
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bczTMWCxOng
